00010 #ifndef BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_ANON_CSV_ER_2010_HPP
00011 #define BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_ANON_CSV_ER_2010_HPP
00012 #include <boost/preprocessor/repetition/enum_params.hpp>
00013 #include <boost/preprocessor/repetition/repeat.hpp>
00014 #include <boost/preprocessor/repetition/repeat_from_to.hpp>
00015 #include <boost/preprocessor/arithmetic/inc.hpp>
00016 
00017 #include <boost/assign/v2/detail/keyword/nil.hpp>
00018 #include <boost/assign/v2/detail/config/limit_csv_arity.hpp>
00019 
00020 #include <boost/assign/v2/anon/make.hpp>
00021 #include <boost/assign/v2/anon/cont.hpp>
00022 
00023 namespace boost{
00024 namespace assign{
00025 namespace v2{
00026 
00027 #define MACRO1(z, i, data) ( BOOST_PP_CAT(_, i) )
00028 #define MACRO2(z, N, data)\
00029         template<typename T>\
00030     typename result_of::anon<T>::type\
00031     csv_anon( BOOST_PP_ENUM_PARAMS(N, T const & _) )\
00032     {\
00033         return anon<T>( v2::_nil) BOOST_PP_REPEAT(N, MACRO1, ~ );\
00034     }\
00035 
00036 BOOST_PP_REPEAT_FROM_TO(
00037         1, 
00038     BOOST_PP_INC(BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_LIMIT_CSV_ARITY),
00039     MACRO2,
00040     ~
00041 )
00042 #undef MACRO1
00043 #undef MACRO2
00044 
00045 }// v2
00046 }// assign
00047 }// boost
00048 
00049 #endif
